Package org.ops4j.peaberry

Interface Summary
OSGiServiceRegistry Helper to manage registered OSGi services, a default implementation is bound to this interface in the Module supplied with the Peaberry bundle.
 

Class Summary
AbstractInjectedActivator Provide a base activator that automatically injects members on startup.
Peaberry Peaberry utility class, provides OSGi service injection for Guice.
 

Annotation Types Summary
OSGiService Annotates members of your implementation class (constructors, methods and fields) where the Injector should either inject an OSGi service proxy, or a ServiceTrackerCustomizer implementation, backed by a ServiceTracker.
OSGiServiceRegistration Annotates members of your implementation class (constructors, methods and fields) where the Injector should take the injected implementation and register it with the framework as an OSGi service.
